Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Score
    This class represents the score of the user whilst playing the game.
    WordApp
    This class is the class that essentially functions as the main class or driver of the program.
    WordApp.WordCatcher
    This is the inner class that evaluates if a string that the user has typed in matches to a word that is falling on the screen This class implements the Runnable interface so that it can be used as a thread to perform its own operations separately from the rest of the program.
    WordDictionary
    This class merely functions as essentially a dictionary of all the words that will be displayed and fall on the screen Here an array stores all the words that will be displayed.
    WordPanel
    This is the class that represents the panel whereby the words will be falling.
    WordRecord
    This is the class that represents a falling word, as well as its associated animations, within the panel of the program.
